title: User can print Notice of Disposition for a Return of 26th Man tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN a User that has permission to Print from the form will see a "Print" button
custom_steps:
WHEN the transaction is in view or edit mode
AND clicking on Print
custom_expected:
THEN it will open a menu where the user can choose to print a Notice of Disposition. 
AND Selecting "Notice of Disposition" will generate a pdf of the Notice of Disposition in English if the language on the player's profile is set to anything other than Spanish. 
AND Selecting "Notice of Disposition" will generate a pdf of the Notice of Disposition in Spanish if the language on the player's profile is set to Spanish. 
AND The English pdf will follow the English Notice of Disposition format.
AND The Spanish pdf will follow the Spanish Notice of Disposition format.

title: User CANNOT create new Add C for player w/o valid MNC
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on a player's profile who has a new or existing Add C
custom_steps: WHEN creating or editing a transaction that prompts the creation of a new Addendum C for a player
custom_expected:
THEN the system will not show or disable the Create New Addendum C link 
AND stop the user with an error message on click that states that a new minor contract must be created first if the player does not have a current Terms Accepted, Pending Approval or Approved MN Contract.

title: User can only see error message that a player requires MNC if player is missing both MNC and Add C
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has major/minor outrights and options
custom_steps: WHEN both the rules checking for the existence of an Addendum C and the existence of a Minor Contract are violated
custom_expected:
THEN only the error message relating to the missing Minor Contract should be displayed. 
BUT if only an addendum C is missing, then that message should display.

title: Club user will have an action item to be created for a player that has been Designated for Assignment for 6 days
custom_preconds:
GIVEN On the 6th Day after the "Placement Date" of a Designate for Release or Assignment, if a player still has a MJ Roster Status of "Designated for Assignment"
AND no pending MJ Roster status, then generate an action item
custom_steps: WHEN player's pending / current roster status is no longer DFA
custom_expected: THEN the action item should disappear
